format.full-description: This GOME 1B description is a hand-modified 7.0 version generated using the GOME PFS Excel document Issue 7 Revision 0 (eps_gomel1_7.0_names_masks.xls) and pfs2xml version 3.3

parameter.name: b1
parameter.description: Number of band data records (i.e., number of readouts) in Level 1a MDR. This number is specified in field NUM_RECS of the MDR.

parameter.name: l1
parameter.description: Length of band data records in Level 1a MDR. This number is specified in field REC_LENGTH of the MDR. For the main channels this number equals the number of detector pixels in a band.

parameter.name: m1
parameter.description: Number of band data records (i.e., number of readouts) in Level 1b MDR. This number is specified in field NUM_RECS of the MDR.

parameter.name: n1
parameter.description: Length of band data records (i.e., number of spectral elements within a readout) in Level 1b MDR. This number is specified in field REC_LENGTH of the MDR.

parameter.name: num_channels
parameter.description: Number of channels (4 main FPA, 2 PMD, see enumerated variables)

parameter.name: num_bands
parameter.description: Number of bands (6 main FPA, 4 PMD, see enumerated variables)

parameter.name: n_psi_f
parameter.description: MME: number of viewing angles (fine grid). This number is specified in field MME_N_PSI_F of record GIADR-1a-MME

parameter.name: n_e_f
parameter.description: MME: number of elevation angles (fine grid). This number is specified in field MME_N_E_F of record GIADR-1a-MME

parameter.name: n_phi_f
parameter.description: MME: number of azimuth angles (fine grid). This number is specified in field MME_N_PHI_F of record GIADR-1a-MME

parameter.name: n_lambda_FPA
parameter.description: MME: number of wavelengths for a main channel

parameter.name: n_lambda_PMD
parameter.description: MME: number of wavelengths for a PMD channel

field.name: PRODUCT_NAME
field.description: Complete name of the product

field.name: PARENT_PRODUCT_NAME_1
field.description: Name of the parent product from which this product has been produced. For Level 0 products, this field is filled with lower case x's.

field.name: PARENT_PRODUCT_NAME_2
field.description: Name of the parent product from which this product has been produced. For Level 0 products or products for which this is not appropriate, this field is filled with lower case x's.

field.name: PARENT_PRODUCT_NAME_3
field.description: Name of the parent product from which this product has been produced. For Level 0 products or products for which this is not appropriate, this field is filled with lower case x's.

field.name: PARENT_PRODUCT_NAME_4
field.description: Name of the parent product from which this product has been produced. For Level 0 products or products for which this is not appropriate, this field is filled with lower case x's.

field.name: INSTRUMENT_ID
field.description: Instrument identification

item.name: All NOAA
item.description: instruments specific to Level 0 NOAA product

field.name: INSTRUMENT_MODEL
field.description: Instrument Model identification

field.name: PRODUCT_TYPE
field.description: Product Type

item.description: NOAC Global Area Coverage AVHRR data
ASCAT calibrated s0 data at full resolution
ASCAT calibrated s0 data at operational resolution (50 km)
ASCAT calibrated s0 data at research resolution (25 km)

field.name: PROCESSING_LEVEL
field.description: Processing Level Identification

field.name: SPACECRAFT_ID
field.description: Spacecraft identification

field.name: SENSING_START
field.description: UTC Time of start of sensing data in this object (PDU, ROI or Full Product)

field.name: SENSING_END
field.description: UTC Time of end of sensing data in this object (PDU, ROI or Full Product)

field.name: SENSING_START_THEORETICAL
field.description: Theoretical UTC Time of start of sensing data in the dump from which this object is derived. This data is the predicted start time at the MPF level.

field.name: SENSING_END_THEORETICAL
field.description: Theoretical UTC Time of end of sensing data in the dump from which this object is derived. This data is the predicted end time at the MPF level.

field.name: PROCESSING_CENTRE
field.description: Processing Centre Identification

item.description: First EUMETSAT EPS Core Ground Segment
Second EUMETSAT EPS Core Ground Segment
Third EUMETSAT EPS Core Ground Segment

field.name: PROCESSOR_MAJOR_VERSION
field.description: Processing chain major version number

field.name: PROCESSOR_MINOR_VERSION
field.description: Processing chain minor version number

field.name: FORMAT_MAJOR_VERSION
field.description: Dataset Format Major Version number

field.name: FORMAT_MINOR_VERSION
field.description: Dataset Format Minor Version number

field.name: PROCESSING_TIME_START
field.description: UTC time of the processing at start of processing for the product

field.name: PROCESSING_TIME_END
field.description: UTC time of the processing at end of processing for the product

field.name: PROCESSING_MODE
field.description: Identification of the mode of processing

field.name: DISPOSITION_MODE
field.description: Identification of the diposition mode

field.name: RECEIVING_GROUND_STATION
field.description: Acquisition Station Identification

item.description: SOCC (NESDIS Satellite Operations Control Centre), Suitland, Maryland

field.name: RECEIVE_TIME_START
field.description: UTC time of the reception at CDA for first Data Item

field.name: RECEIVE_TIME_END
field.description: UTC time of the reception at CDA for last Data Item

field.name: ORBIT_START
field.description: Start Orbit Number, counted incrementally since launch

field.name: ORBIT_END
field.description: Stop Orbit Number

field.name: ACTUAL_PRODUCT_SIZE
field.description: Size of the complete product

field.name: STATE_VECTOR_TIME
field.description: Epoch time (in UTC) of the orbital elements and the orbit state vector. this corresponds to the time of crossing the ascending node for ORBIT_START

field.name: SEMI_MAJOR_AXIS
field.description: Semi major axis of orbit at time of the ascending node crossing.

field.name: ECCENTRICITY
field.description: Orbit eccentricity at time of the ascending node crossing

field.name: INCLINATION
field.description: Orbit inclination at time of the ascending node crossing

field.name: PERIGEE_ARGUMENT
field.description: Argument of perigee at time of the ascending node crossing

field.name: RIGHT_ASCENSION
field.description: Right ascension at time of the ascending node crossing

field.name: MEAN_ANOMALY
field.description: Mean anomaly at time of the ascending node crossing

field.name: X_POSITION
field.description: X position of the orbit state vector in the orbit frame at ascending node

field.name: Y_POSITION
field.description: Y position of the orbit state vector in the orbit frame at ascending node

field.name: Z_POSITION
field.description: Z position of the orbit state vector in the orbit frame at ascending node

field.name: X_VELOCITY
field.description: X velocity of the orbit state vector in the orbit frame at ascending node

field.name: Y_VELOCITY
field.description: Y velocity of the orbit state vector in the orbit frame at ascending node

field.name: Z_VELOCITY
field.description: Z velocity of the orbit state vector in the orbit frame at ascending node

field.name: EARTH_SUN_DISTANCE_RATIO
field.description: Earth-Sun distance ratio - ratio of current Eart-Sun distance to Mean Earth-Sun distance

field.name: LOCATION_TOLERANCE_RADIAL
field.description: Nadir Earth location tolerance radial

field.name: LOCATION_TOLERANCE_CROSSTRACK
field.description: Nadir Earth location tolerance cross-track

field.name: LOCATION_TOLERANCE_ALONGTRACK
field.description: Nadir Earth location tolerance along-track

field.name: YAW_ERROR
field.description: Constant Yaw attitude error

field.name: ROLL_ERROR
field.description: Constant Roll attitude error

field.name: PITCH_ERROR
field.description: Constant Pitch attitude error

field.name: SUBSAT_LATITUDE_START
field.description: Latitude of sub-satellite point at start of the data set

field.name: SUBSAT_LONGITUDE_START
field.description: Longitude of sub-satellite point at start of the data set

field.name: SUBSAT_LATITUDE_END
field.description: Latitude of sub-satellite point at end of the data set

field.name: SUBSAT_LONGITUDE_END
field.description: Longitude of sub-satellite point at end of the data set

field.name: LEAP_SECOND
field.description: Occurence of Leap second within the product. Field is set to -1, 0 or +1 dependent upon occurrence of leap second and direction.

field.name: LEAP_SECOND_UTC
field.description: UTC time of occurrence of the Leap Second (If no leap second in the product, value is null)

field.name: TOTAL_RECORDS
field.description: Total count of all records in the product

field.name: TOTAL_MPHR
field.description: Total count of all MPHRs in product (should always be 1!)

field.name: TOTAL_SPHR
field.description: Total count of all SPHRs in product (should be 0 or 1 only)

field.name: TOTAL_IPR
field.description: Total count of all IPRs in the product

field.name: TOTAL_GEADR
field.description: Total count of all GEADRs in the product

field.name: TOTAL_GIADR
field.description: Total count of all GIADRs in the product

field.name: TOTAL_VEADR
field.description: Total count of all VEADRs in the product

field.name: TOTAL_VIADR
field.description: Total count of all VIADRs in the product

field.name: TOTAL_MDR
field.description: Total count of all MDRs in the product

field.name: COUNT_DEGRADED_INST_MDR
field.description: Count of MDRs with degradation due to instrument problems

field.name: COUNT_DEGRADED_PROC_MDR
field.description: Count of MDRs with degradation due to processing problems

field.name: COUNT_DEGRADED_INST_MDR_BLOCKS
field.description: Count of the number of blocks of MDRs degraded due to degraded instrument

field.name: COUNT_DEGRADED_PROC_MDR_BLOCKS
field.description: Count of the number of blocks of MDRs degraded due to degraded processing

field.name: DURATION_OF_PRODUCT
field.description: The duration of the product in milliseconds

field.name: MILLISECONDS_OF_DATA_PRESENT
field.description: The total amount of data present in the product

field.name: MILLISECONDS_OF_DATA_MISSING
field.description: The total amount of data missing from the prodcut

field.name: SUBSETTED_PRODUCT
field.description: Set when product has been subsetted (e.g. geographically subsetted using a region of interest filter). Implies the presence of one or more UMARF GIADRs in GAD section for product retrieved from UMARF.

field.name: N_SCANS
field.description: Number of scans in the product

field.name: N_VALID_WITH_MISS_DP
field.description: Number of valid scans with missing data packets

field.name: N_MISS_DP
field.description: Number of missing data packets in valid scans

field.name: N_MISSING_SCANS
field.description: Number of missing scans

field.name: N_NN_DETECTOR_TEMP_1
field.description: Number of scans with non-nominal detector temperature, FPA 1

field.name: N_NN_DETECTOR_TEMP_2
field.description: Number of scans with non-nominal detector temperature, FPA 2

field.name: N_NN_DETECTOR_TEMP_3
field.description: Number of scans with non-nominal detector temperature, FPA 3

field.name: N_NN_DETECTOR_TEMP_4
field.description: Number of scans with non-nominal detector temperature, FPA 4

field.name: N_NN_DETECTOR_TEMP_5
field.description: Number of scans with non-nominal detector temperature, PMD p

field.name: N_NN_DETECTOR_TEMP_6
field.description: Number of scans with non-nominal detector temperature, PMD s

field.name: N_NN_PDP_TEMP
field.description: Number of scans with non-nominal pre-disperser temperature

field.name: N_NN_RAD_TEMP
field.description: Number of scans with non-nominal radiator temperature

field.name: N_NN_WLS_U
field.description: Number of scans with non-nominal WLS lamp voltage

field.name: N_NN_WLS_I
field.description: Number of scans with non-nominal WLS lamp current

field.name: N_NN_SLS_U
field.description: Number of scans with non-nominal SLS lamp voltage

field.name: N_NN_SLS_I
field.description: Number of scans with non-nominal SLS lamp current

field.name: N_INV_UTC
field.description: Number of scans with invalid UTC

field.name: N_NADIR_SCAN
field.description: Number of scans in Nadir scanning observation mode

field.name: N_NTH_POLE_SCAN
field.description: Number of scans in North pole scanning observation mode

field.name: N_STH_POLE_SCAN
field.description: Number of scans in South pole scanning observation mode

field.name: N_OTHER_SCAN
field.description: Number of scans in Other scanning observation mode

field.name: N_NADIR_STATIC
field.description: Number of scans in Nadir static observation mode

field.name: N_OTHER_STATIC
field.description: Number of scans in Other Static observation mode

field.name: N_DARK
field.description: Number of scans in Dark observation observation mode

field.name: N_LED
field.description: Number of scans in LED observation mode

field.name: N_WLS
field.description: Number of scans in WLS observation mode

field.name: N_SLS
field.description: Number of scans in SLS observation mode

field.name: N_SLS_DIFF
field.description: Number of scans in SLS over diffuser observation mode

field.name: N_SUN
field.description: Number of scans in Sun observation mode

field.name: N_MOON
field.description: Number of scans in Moon observation mode

field.name: N_IDLE
field.description: Number of scans in Idle observation mode

field.name: N_TEST
field.description: Number of scans in Test observation mode

field.name: N_DUMP
field.description: Number of scans in Dump observation mode

field.name: N_INVALID
field.description: Number of scans assigned Invalid observation mode

field.name: N_MIN_INTENSITY_1
field.description: Number of scans where the minimum mean uncalibrated radiance is below a specified threshold, band FPA 1a

field.name: N_MIN_INTENSITY_2
field.description: Number of scans where the minimum mean uncalibrated radiance is below a specified threshold, band FPA 1b

field.name: N_MIN_INTENSITY_3
field.description: Number of scans where the minimum mean uncalibrated radiance is below a specified threshold, band FPA 2a

field.name: N_MIN_INTENSITY_4
field.description: Number of scans where the minimum mean uncalibrated radiance is below a specified threshold, band FPA 2b

field.name: N_MIN_INTENSITY_5
field.description: Number of scans where the minimum mean uncalibrated radiance is below a specified threshold, band FPA 3

field.name: N_MIN_INTENSITY_6
field.description: Number of scans where the minimum mean uncalibrated radiance is below a specified threshold, band FPA 4

field.name: N_MIN_INTENSITY_7
field.description: Number of scans where the minimum mean uncalibrated radiance is below a specified threshold, band PMD p

field.name: N_MIN_INTENSITY_8
field.description: Number of scans where the minimum mean uncalibrated radiance is below a specified threshold, band PMD s

field.name: N_SATURATED_1
field.description: Number of scans with saturated pixels, band FPA 1a

field.name: N_SATURATED_2
field.description: Number of scans with saturated pixels, band FPA 1b

field.name: N_SATURATED_3
field.description: Number of scans with saturated pixels, band FPA 2a

field.name: N_SATURATED_4
field.description: Number of scans with saturated pixels, band FPA 2b

field.name: N_SATURATED_5
field.description: Number of scans with saturated pixels, band FPA 3

field.name: N_SATURATED_6
field.description: Number of scans with saturated pixels, band FPA 4

field.name: N_SATURATED_7
field.description: Number of scans with saturated pixels, band PMD p

field.name: N_SATURATED_8
field.description: Number of scans with saturated pixels, band PMD s

field.name: N_HOT_1
field.description: Number of scans with hot pixels, band FPA 1a

field.name: N_HOT_2
field.description: Number of scans with hot pixels, band FPA 1b

field.name: N_HOT_3
field.description: Number of scans with hot pixels, band FPA 2a

field.name: N_HOT_4
field.description: Number of scans with hot pixels, band FPA 2b

field.name: N_HOT_5
field.description: Number of scans with hot pixels, band FPA 3

field.name: N_HOT_6
field.description: Number of scans with hot pixels, band FPA 4

field.name: N_HOT_7
field.description: Number of scans with hot pixels, band PMD p

field.name: N_HOT_8
field.description: Number of scans with hot pixels, band PMD s

field.name: N_SAA
field.description: Number of scans in the SAA

field.name: N_SUNGLINT
field.description: Number of scans with sunglint danger

field.name: N_RAINBOW
field.description: Number of scans with rainbow danger

field.name: N_MODE_GEOLOCATION
field.description: Number of scans with possible mismatch between observation mode and geolocation

field.name: N_MISS_STOKES_1
field.description: Number of scans with missing Stokes fractions, PMD band 1

field.name: N_MISS_STOKES_2
field.description: Number of scans with missing Stokes fractions, PMD band 2

field.name: N_MISS_STOKES_3
field.description: Number of scans with missing Stokes fractions, PMD band 3

field.name: N_MISS_STOKES_4
field.description: Number of scans with missing Stokes fractions, PMD band 4

field.name: N_MISS_STOKES_5
field.description: Number of scans with missing Stokes fractions, PMD band 5

field.name: N_MISS_STOKES_6
field.description: Number of scans with missing Stokes fractions, PMD band 6

field.name: N_MISS_STOKES_7
field.description: Number of scans with missing Stokes fractions, PMD band 7

field.name: N_MISS_STOKES_8
field.description: Number of scans with missing Stokes fractions, PMD band 8

field.name: N_MISS_STOKES_9
field.description: Number of scans with missing Stokes fractions, PMD band 9

field.name: N_MISS_STOKES_10
field.description: Number of scans with missing Stokes fractions, PMD band 10

field.name: N_MISS_STOKES_11
field.description: Number of scans with missing Stokes fractions, PMD band 11

field.name: N_MISS_STOKES_12
field.description: Number of scans with missing Stokes fractions, PMD band 12

field.name: N_MISS_STOKES_13
field.description: Number of scans with missing Stokes fractions, PMD band 13

field.name: N_MISS_STOKES_14
field.description: Number of scans with missing Stokes fractions, PMD band 14

field.name: N_MISS_STOKES_15
field.description: Number of scans with missing Stokes fractions, PMD band 15

field.name: N_BAD_STOKES_1
field.description: Number of scans with bad Stokes fractions, PMD band 1

field.name: N_BAD_STOKES_2
field.description: Number of scans with bad Stokes fractions, PMD band 2

field.name: N_BAD_STOKES_3
field.description: Number of scans with bad Stokes fractions, PMD band 3

field.name: N_BAD_STOKES_4
field.description: Number of scans with bad Stokes fractions, PMD band 4

field.name: N_BAD_STOKES_5
field.description: Number of scans with bad Stokes fractions, PMD band 5

field.name: N_BAD_STOKES_6
field.description: Number of scans with bad Stokes fractions, PMD band 6

field.name: N_BAD_STOKES_7
field.description: Number of scans with bad Stokes fractions, PMD band 7

field.name: N_BAD_STOKES_8
field.description: Number of scans with bad Stokes fractions, PMD band 8

field.name: N_BAD_STOKES_9
field.description: Number of scans with bad Stokes fractions, PMD band 9

field.name: N_BAD_STOKES_10
field.description: Number of scans with bad Stokes fractions, PMD band 10

field.name: N_BAD_STOKES_11
field.description: Number of scans with bad Stokes fractions, PMD band 11

field.name: N_BAD_STOKES_12
field.description: Number of scans with bad Stokes fractions, PMD band 12

field.name: N_BAD_STOKES_13
field.description: Number of scans with bad Stokes fractions, PMD band 13

field.name: N_BAD_STOKES_14
field.description: Number of scans with bad Stokes fractions, PMD band 14

field.name: N_BAD_STOKES_15
field.description: Number of scans with bad Stokes fractions, PMD band 15

field.name: N_CLOUD
field.description: Number of scans with fractional cloud above a specified threshold

field.name: PROCESSING_INDICATOR
field.description: Auxiliary information on processing details. May be filled as needed (no requirements imposed). If not used, this field is filled by lower case x's.

geadr.name: geadr-configuration
geadr.description: Genearl processor configuration parameters (also for l1b)

geadr.name: geadr-keydata
geadr.description: Pre-flight calibration key data status list (also for l1b)

geadr.name: geadr-1b-reflectance
geadr.description: Surface reflectance database for cloud algorithm

geadr.name: geadr-1b-tomsuv-reflectance
geadr.description: TOMS UV reflectance database for snow/ice detection in cloud algorithm

giadr.name: giadr-channels
giadr.description: Definition of wavelength ranges for valid data

field.description: Channel number
Start wavelength of the valid data in the specified channel
End wavelength of the valid data in the specified channel
Approximate start pixel of the valid data in the specified channel
Approximate end pixel of the valid data in the specified channel

field.name: START_UTC_SUN
field.description: Start UTC date/time of Sun calibration mode measurements

field.name: END_UTC_SUN
field.description: End UTC date/time of Sun calibration mode measurements

field.name: N_INTENSITY
field.description: Number of Sun calibration mode spectra which pass the intensity check

field.name: F_N_INTENSITY
field.description: Flag indicating that number of sun calibration mode spectra passing the intensity check was too low
Flag indicating that no SMR was generated due to missing Sun calibration mode measurements, per channel

field.name: PMD_TRANSFER
field.description: PMD transfer mode

field.name: PMD_READOUT
field.description: PMD readout mode

item.name: Various
item.description: PMD readout mode changes within scan

field.description: Wavelength grid for SMR spectrum (after Doppler correction)
Solar Mean Reference spectrum
Absolute error on Solar Mean Reference spectrum
Relative error in the mean of the Nsun spectra having passed the intensity check before correction for the irradiance response of the instrument
Channel number
Band number
Start pixel of the band in the specified channel
Number of pixels in the specified band
Start wavelength
End wavelength
Start pixel of the band in the specified channel
Number of pixels in the specified band
Calibration steps applied in level 0 to 1b processing for every observation mode - first dimension mode, second dimension calibration steps

field.name: DEGRADED_INST_MDR
field.description: Quality of MDR has been degraded from nominal due to an instrument degradation. Occurs if any of F_NN_DT, F_NN_PDP, F_NN_RAD, F_NN_WLS_U, F_NN_WLS_I, F_NN_SLS_U, F_NN_SLS_I, F_SAT, F_HOT, F_MIN in PCD_BASIC have been raised

field.name: DEGRADED_PROC_MDR
field.description: Quality of MDR has been degraded from nominal due to a processing degradation. Occurs if any of F_MISS, F_SAA, F_SUNGLINT, F_RAINBOW, F_OLD_CAL_DATA in PCD_BASIC, or F_INV_STOKES in PCD_EARTH have been raised

field.name: OUTPUT_SELECTION
field.description: Calibrated radiance or sun-normalised radiance
Flag indicating non-nominal detector temperature, per channel

field.name: F_NN_PDP
field.description: Flag indicating non-nominal pre-disperser temperature

field.name: F_NN_RAD
field.description: Flag indicating non-nominal radiator temperature

field.name: F_NN_WLS_U
field.description: Flag indicating non-nominal WLS voltage

field.name: F_NN_WLS_I
field.description: Flag indicating non-nominal WLS current

field.name: F_NN_SLS_U
field.description: Flag indicating non-nominal SLS voltage

field.name: F_NN_SLS_I
field.description: Flag indicating non-nominal SLS current

field.name: F_INV_UTC
field.description: Flag indicating invalid UTC

field.name: F_MISS
field.description: Flag indicating missing data packets
Flag indicating saturated pixels, per band
Flag indicating hot pixels, per band

field.name: F_SAA
field.description: Flag indicating whether scan is in the SAA

field.name: F_SUNGLINT
field.description: Flag indicating danger of sun-glint

field.name: F_RAINBOW
field.description: Flag indicating danger of rainbow

field.name: F_MODE_GEOLOCATION
field.description: Flag indicating possible mismatch between observation mode and geolocation
Flag indicating that mean raw signal is below a specified threshold, per band
Mean raw signal per band

field.name: F_OLD_CAL_DATA
field.description: Flag to indicate that old in-flight auxiliary calibration data is in use

item.description: No in-flight auxiliary calibration data is old

field.description: Flag indicating missing (formerly called 'invalid') Stokes fractions, per PMD band
Flag indicating bad Stokes fractions, per PMD band, and main channel readout
Scene variability within a 187.5 ms groundpixel

field.name: F_CLOUD
field.description: Flag indicating that effective cloud fraction is above a specified level
Cloud fitting mode (default or snow/ice)

item.name: cloud
item.description: Default fitting for c and z_c

item.name: snow_ice
item.description: Snow/ice mode for A and z

field.description: Fail flag
Cloud fitting parameter 1 - depending on FIT_MODE this is either cloud top pressure or lower reflecting surface pressure
Cloud fitting parameter 2 - depending on FIT_MODE this is either effective cloud fraction or albedo for lower reflecting surface
Error in Cloud fitting parameter 1
Error in Cloud fitting parameter 2
Goodness of fit
Final Chi-Square perturbation
Cloud albedo. This is always greater than or equal to the a priori cloud albedo
Surface albedo used in the retrieval (at 2 wavelengths)
Surface pressure

field.name: OBSERVATION_MODE
field.description: Observation mode

field.name: PMD_TRANSFER
field.description: PMD transfer mode

field.name: PMD_READOUT
field.description: PMD readout mode

item.name: Various
item.description: PMD readout mode changes within scan

field.description: Scanner viewing angle with additional element at end of scan
UTC time associated with every second scanner position (0,2,...,62)

field.name: LATITUDE
field.description: Geodetic latitude (-90 to 90, -90 is the south pole, 90 the north pole, 0 the equator) (Earth-fixed CS)

field.name: LONGITUDE
field.description: Geocentric longitude (-180 to 180, meridian is 0 and minus is going west) (Earth-fixed CS)
Geodetic altitude of satellite (earth-fixed CS)
Solar zenith angle (Satellite Relative Actual CS)
Solar azimuth angle (Satellite Relative Actual CS)

field.name: LATITUDE
field.description: Geodetic latitude (-90 to 90, -90 is the south pole, 90 the north pole, 0 the equator) (Earth-fixed CS)

field.name: LONGITUDE
field.description: Geocentric longitude (-180 to 180, meridian is 0 and minus is going west) (Earth-fixed CS)

field.name: LATITUDE
field.description: Geodetic latitude (-90 to 90, -90 is the south pole, 90 the north pole, 0 the equator) (Earth-fixed CS)

field.name: LONGITUDE
field.description: Geocentric longitude (-180 to 180, meridian is 0 and minus is going west) (Earth-fixed CS)

field.name: LATITUDE
field.description: Geodetic latitude (-90 to 90, -90 is the south pole, 90 the north pole, 0 the equator) (Earth-fixed CS)

field.name: LONGITUDE
field.description: Geocentric longitude (-180 to 180, meridian is 0 and minus is going west) (Earth-fixed CS)

field.name: LATITUDE
field.description: Geodetic latitude (-90 to 90, -90 is the south pole, 90 the north pole, 0 the equator) (Earth-fixed CS)

field.name: LONGITUDE
field.description: Geocentric longitude (-180 to 180, meridian is 0 and minus is going west) (Earth-fixed CS)
Solar zenith angle at height h0 (specified as initialisation parameter), points EFG (topocentric CS)
Solar azimuth angle at height h0, points EFG (topocentric CS)
